name: NotifySyncResults
description:
Notify Ramp of a list of sync results.

Use this tool to inform Ramp about sync results, ensuring proper handling of subsequent requests with an idempotency key.

parameters.name: sync_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing arrays of failed and successful syncs, an idempotency key, and a sync type.

error.description: describes the reason why the sync object failed to sync.

id.description: ID that uniquely identifies a transaction/reimbursement in Ramp systems.

failed_syncs.description: A list of objects that failed to be synced.

idempotency_key.description: An idempotency key is a unique value generated by the client which the server uses to recognize subsequent retries of the same request. To avoid collisions, we encourage clients to use random generated UUIDs.

deep_link_url.description: URL that links to the object in the remote ERP system. Only applicable for bills.

id.description: ID that uniquely identifies the object to sync in Ramp systems.

reference_id.description: ID that uniquely identifies the object to sync in remote ERP systems.

successful_syncs.description: A list of successfully synced objects.

sync_type.description: The type of object to sync.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.
